content.text:
HON. KAY GRANGER

                                of texas

                    in the house of representatives

                      Wednesday, November 8, 2017
content.speaker: None

content.text:
Ms. GRANGER. Mr. Speaker, I was unable to make votes. Had I been 
present, I would have voted YEA on Roll Call No. 607; YEA on Roll Call 
No. 608; and YEA on Roll Call No. 609.
content.speaker: Ms. GRANGER
